00026 typedef enum

00029     STEP,
00030     QUIT,

00039 #define NB_COMMANDS 8 
00045 Command commands[NB_COMMANDS] = {
00046     [RUN]        = { "run", "run program without step by step" },
00047     [STEP]       = { "step", "make a step in the program" },
00048     [QUIT]       = { "quit", "close the debugger" },
00049     [STATUS]     = { "status", "display registers" },
00050     [RESTART]    = { "restart", "restart the program" },
00051     [HELP]       = { "help", "display help" },
00052     [DISPLAY]    = { "display", "display a variable or a mem" },
00053     [BREAKPOINT] = { "breakpoint", "put or delete a breakpoint" }
00054 };
00055 
00062 int find_command(char *cmd)
00063 {
00064     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NB_COMMANDS; ++i)
00065         if (!strncmp(cmd, commands[i].name, strlen(commands[i].name)) && strlen(cmd) == strlen(commands[i].name))
00066             return i;
00067 
00068     return UNKNOWN;
00069 }
00070 
00076 void display_help()
00077 {
00078     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NB_COMMANDS; ++i)
00079         printf("  %s : %s\n", commands[i].name, commands[i].help);
00080 }

00127 void debugger_start(Debugger *debug)
00128 {
00129     breakpoints_list breakpoints;
00130     breakpoint_list_new(&breakpoints);
00131 
00132     bool end_found = false;
00133     bool step_by_step = true;
00134     bool execute = false;
00135     bool finish = false;
00136     do
00137     {
00138         printf("$ ");
00139         fflush(stdout);
00140 
00141         char line[LINE_MAX];
00142         readLine(line, LINE_MAX);
00143         char *cmd = strtok(line, " ");
00144         //printf("token => %s\n", line);
00145 
00146         switch (find_command(cmd))
00147         {
00148             case RUN:
00149                 step_by_step = false;
00150                 execute = true;
00151                 break;
00152             case STEP:
00153                 step_by_step = true;
00154                 execute = true;
00155                 break;
00156             case STATUS:
00157                 execute = false;
00158                 sivm_status(&debug->sivm);
00159                 break;
00160             case QUIT:
00161                 finish = true;
00162                 execute = false;
00163                 break;
00164             case RESTART:
00165                 debugger_new(debug);
00166                 end_found = false;
00167                 step_by_step = true;
00168                 execute = false;
00169                 break;
00170             case DISPLAY:
00171                 {
00172                     execute = false;
00173                     char *type = strtok(0, " ");
00174                     if (!type || strlen(type) != 3)
00175                     {
00176                         printf("Usage: display (reg|mem) number\n");
00177                         break;
00178                     }
00179                     char *num = strtok(0, " ");
00180                     if (!num || !isdigit(num[0]))
00181                     {
00182                         printf("Usage: display (reg|mem) number\n");
00183                         break;
00184                     }
00185                     unsigned int nb = atoi(num);
00186 
00187                     if (!strcmp(type, "reg"))
00188                         printf("=> register %d: %d\n", nb, nb);
00189                     else if (!strcmp(type, "mem"))
00190                         printf("=> register %d: %d\n", nb, nb);
00191                     else
00192                         printf("Usage: display (reg|mem) number\n");
00193                 }
00194                 break;
00195             case BREAKPOINT:
00196                 {
00197                     execute = false;
00198                     char *type = strtok(0, " ");
00199                     if (!type)
00200                     {
00201                         printf("breakpoints:\n");
00202                         breakpoint_list_display(&breakpoints);
00203                     }
00204                     else if (!strcmp(type, "add"))
00205                     {
00206                         char *num = strtok(0, " ");
00207                         if (!num || !isdigit(num[0]))
00208                         {
00209                             printf("Usage: breakpoint\nUsage: breakpoint add line\nUsage: breakpoint rm num\n");
00210                             break;
00211                         }
00212                         unsigned int nb = atoi(num);
00213                         if (!breakpoint_list_add(&breakpoints, nb))
00214                             printf("breakpoint already exists\n");
00215                         else
00216                             printf("added breakpoint at line %d\n", nb);
00217                     }
00218                     else if (!strcmp(type, "rm"))
00219                     {
00220                         char *num = strtok(0, " ");
00221                         if (!num || !isdigit(num[0]))
00222                         {
00223                             printf("Usage: breakpoint\nUsage: breakpoint add line\nUsage: breakpoint rm num\n");
00224                             break;
00225                         }
00226                         unsigned int nb = atoi(num);
00227                         if (!breakpoint_list_rm(&breakpoints, nb))
00228                             printf("no breakpoint\n");
00229                     }
00230                     else
00231                         printf("Usage: breakpoint\nUsage: breakpoint add line\nUsage: breakpoint rm num\n");
00232                 }
00233                 break;
00234             case UNKNOWN:
00235                 printf("Unknown command\n");
00236             case HELP:
00237                 execute = false;
00238                 display_help();
00239                 break;
00240         }
00241 
00242         while (execute)
00243         {
00244             if (end_found)
00245             {
00246                 printf("End of program reached\n");
00247                 break;
00248             }
00249 
00250             end_found = !sivm_step(&debug->sivm);
00251 
00252             if (step_by_step) break;
00253         }
00254     }
00255     while (!finish);
00256 }
